1.Open CubeBuilder
2.Add a group and drag a data field to the group.
3.Click the Joint data set button then open the Dataset Joint Dialog.
4.Join the dataset, and Click OK.
5.OK the CubeBuilder, and Save the report.
6.Redo the 1-4.
7.Cancel the CubeBuilder, then throws the exception.

Caused by:
ElementRefValue item = (ElementRefValue) valueList.get( i );
